title: usr trying to install on mac hving isues
summary: Investigated macOS installation issues with application startup
Identified potential configuration problems with PATH and shell environment
Initiated logging and diagnostic request to gather more information

quality.preExisting: Potential macOS compatibility and configuration issues

suggestedTasks.title: Create Comprehensive macOS Installation Guide for SQUAD
suggestedTasks.description: Develop a detailed, step-by-step installation guide specifically for macOS users. The guide should cover shell configuration (bash/zsh), PATH setup, potential environment variables, and common troubleshooting steps. Focus on providing clear instructions for different macOS versions and terminal configurations.
suggestedTasks.reason: User experienced installation difficulties indicating lack of clear macOS-specific documentation

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Cross-Platform Startup Diagnostics for SQUAD
suggestedTasks.description: Add robust startup diagnostic logging mechanism that provides clear, actionable error messages for different operating systems. Create a self-diagnostic mode that checks environment configuration, required dependencies, and provides specific guidance for resolution.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current installation process lacks clear diagnostics for troubleshooting

gotchas: macOS PATH and shell configuration differs from Linux
